mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CALENDAR A, CLASS B WHERE A.CLASS_SEQ = B.SEQ

SELECT A.CLASS_SEQ, A.DAILY, A.STUDENT_SEQ, B.NAME AS STUDENT_NAME, GET_CODE_NAME('7', A.DIVISION) as DIVISION, A.MEMO, D.NAME AS ADMIN_NAME, GET_CODE_NAME('8', C.ROOM) AS ROOM FROM CALENDAR A JOIN STUDENT B ON A.STUDENT_SEQ = B.SEQ JOIN CLASS C ON A.CLASS_SEQ = C.SEQ JOIN ADMIN D ON C.ADMIN_SEQ = D.SEQ WHERE 1=1 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM A.DAILY) = #{year} AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM A.DAILY) = #{month} AND ( (D.DIVISION = 'system') -- system 권한일 경우 전체 조회 OR (D.DIVISION = 'admin' AND D.SEQ = #{seq}) -- admin 권한일 경우 자신의 반만 조회 )

SELECT C.SEQ AS CLASS_SEQ, B.SEQ AS STUDENT_SEQ, B.NAME AS STUDENT_NAME, TO_CHAR(A.DAILY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS DAILY, GET_CODE_NAME('7', A.DIVISION) AS DIVISION, A.MEMO, D.NAME AS ADMIN_NAME, D.SEQ AS ADMIN_SEQ, D.DIVISION AS ADMIN_DIVISION FROM CALENDAR A JOIN STUDENT B ON A.STUDENT_SEQ = B.SEQ JOIN CLASS C ON A.CLASS_SEQ = C.SEQ JOIN ADMIN D ON C.ADMIN_SEQ = D.SEQ WHERE A.STUDENT_SEQ = #{seq}
